name: Andrew
text: Wall-beds are making a comeback. This business will build yours to suit your room and install it! Great prices I recommend this to anyone looking to add floor space or just have a nice nap nook!

name: Troy Dyer
text: Excellent service nice people

name: Kay Moore
text: Great choice of bedding and wall beds!

name: Vani Joy
text:
Great prices! Great service!
Personal focus on needs of each customer, free delivery.

name: Jane Bishop
text: The owners are professional and very friendly. I felt like I was among friends.

name: Brittaney Clark
text: I absolutely love this place. We just bought our king bed from them. & made sure it was delivered today! The lady there was the best and made me feel comfortable and she made sure I loved what I bought. Thank you so much for the experience.

resp.text: Thank you for stopping in and doing business with us. It was our pleasure to get to serve you.

name: Richard Schneider
text: We bought a queen size mattress and box spring. We got excellent customer service. We love the set we got so far.

resp.text: Thank you for doing business with us. We are glad your are enjoying purchase.

name: David Conner
text: Great place to shop for a great bed. Mrs Eunice is a great sales lady and gives you time and space to decide on what you like and want. Thanks for your patience and time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for doing business with us.  It was our pleasure to serve you. We hope you are enjoying your bed. Rest well.

name: Jeff Reynolds
text: Excellent experience, by far the best deal we have ever gotten on a mattress box spring set. Can't reccomend enough.

resp.text: Thank you!!! We hope you enjoy your mattress for many years to come. Thank you for doing business with us.

name: Richard Kunsman
text: Amazing! This has been the best experience I've had buying a mattress. I love the no pressure and family friendly staff. I am recommending to my family and friends!!

resp.text:
Thank you for those kind words.  It was our pleasure to serve you.
We hope you are enjoying your mattress and resting well.

name: Brian Harris
text: I made the right decision in buying a mattress set from BoxDrop. I'd been in the market for sometime for a top quality affordable king sized mattress set and I found it here. The staff is very professional, helpful, and knowledgeable. I'm still enjoying my mattress set several months later. It has to be the most comfortable set I've ever purchased.

resp.text: We’re very happy to hear that you are enjoying your king mattress set. Thanks for the great review!

name: Chris Hartley
text: Great quality (name brands) and amazing prices.

resp.text: We hope you are enjoying your mattress and resting well. Thanks for the review.

name: Greg Padgett
text: Purchased a queen Sapphire Sleep Copper Memory foam for my son.  He LOVES it!

resp.text: We are glad he is enjoying the mattress.  Thanks for the great review!

name: Sarah Cochran
text:
Arielle was fantastic!  I was presently surprised at how friendly and personable she was during our visit.  She did not criticize the competition only emphasized the Sleep Number qualities.  This impressed me enough to try out the beds and in the end, buying one. It was clear that she and Royce (the other sales person) had a great rapport as well.
Very pleasant experience!

name: Tony Denham
text: If you are at the Madison ALABAMA store stop in and see Danielle. Knowledgeable, helpful and friendly. Store is clean and we'll stocked. Happy Hunting.

name: Jeff Hillman
text:
BUYER BEWARE!  I would give ZERO stars, but that is not an option.  Been waiting 5 weeks for delivery, now they want to reschedule mid-April and the mattress was on the truck in route to my house.  They won't even tell me where my mattress will be stored for the next 3 weeks.

Pay up front and you are at their mercy for delivery.  Customer service is beyond horrible.  Nobody can make a decision.  Can't speak to a manager-they won't even provide a name or a number.  But when you do get to speak to someone, they will say "sleep well."  How in the hell can I sleep well if I can't get the mattress?

resp.text: We'd like to look into this with you further and see what we can do to help with your concerns. Just give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 (8AM-8PM CST M-F, 8:30AM-5PM CST Saturday).

name: Maya McDonald
text: We already had a sleep number bed I purchased 12 years ago. It was such a life changer for me then!!  We recently moved and our pump wasn’t functioning properly so we decided to get a new one. The new ones are even more comfortable. Arielle was extremely helpful. Getting good sleep is personal for her and that makes her great at her job. She’s very knowledgeable about her products and what’s required for a good nights sleep. She was a huge help!  I can’t wait for ours to be delivered!

name: Stan Shoemaker
text: You came so close to a perfect experience, but blew it in the end. Purchase included removal of old bed, but I just found the old base cover and pump in my trash can. I guess we’re not supposed to have room in it for our household trash now

resp.text: We'd like to look into this with you further and see what we can do to help with your concerns. Just give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 (8AM-8PM CST M-F, 8:30AM-5PM CST Saturday).

name: Craig Whisenant
text: Arielle is an encyclopedia of information about Sleep Number and their products. She is pleasant and so helpful and doesn't pressure you to buy anything.  We are very pleased with our experience and what we purchased from her.

name: Donna Boyett
text: The Customer Service was Wonderful!! Our sales representative was knowledgeable and very personable. My husband and I had a Great experience and left Very Confident that we made one of the best decisions Ever!! Now we can't wait until our mattress is delivered!!!

name: Bill Schlosser
text: My wife and I loved the attention and help that Robert gave us in the store. He answered all of our silly questions and made us feel comfortable (so did the bed). We both loved his honesty. The demo was so cool and really helped us to understand the technology behind the bed. We are now proud owners of the i8 king.

name: Nancy Small
text: Anthony is excellent salesman and very courteous. I appreciate the experience with him and my big purchase.

name: Leila Moorehouse
text:
Arielle was awesome. She gave us options & she gave us her suggestions. She is very customer service oriented & super friendly. Arielle puts 110% of her time & focus on her clients. We greatly appreciate her one on one interaction with us.

Thanks Arielle!!
Dwayne & Leila Moorehouse

name: Ken Stapler
text: It was a great experience. No pressure, just information and assistance. Anthony was nice, funny and helpful..and very patient.

name: Yolanda K
text: Great service. The Serah was very nice but did not inform us that the base was not refundable with the mattress. We bought the p6 and we hated it after the first night. I cried because I didn't want to sleep on it again. I've given it a few more nights and I still hate it. It's nothing like what it felt like in the store. Big mistake! I have no idea what I'm supposed to do with this base. Oh, and some components on the base don't work either. I'm dreading calling customer service because I hear they suck. I can't stand company's that don't stand behind what they sell.

name: Bryan Barley
text: Service was great. Royce is a very attentive salesperson, and knows his product very well. Store tends to be crowded so you may have to be patient.

name: Royce Craft
text:
This store is AWESOME!
And I should know.

name: Paul Smith
text: Very helpful sales staff.  Serah Beth really knew the product line and helped me select the best options for me!

name: Amber James
text: Joshua was amazing. He showed us all the different bed, pillow, and bedding options based upon our list of requests. He listened to our concerns, answered our questions, and made the process incredibly simple.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your review of our Madison store. We're thrilled Joshua was so helpful, and provided you with lots of great information on how to get your best night's sleep!

name: george bush
text: Great customer service and excellent knowledge transfer of what the sleep number bed and do for your customers

name: mike colbert
text: Royce Craft we above and beyond normal customer satisfaction. This is our Second Sleep by Numbers and we can not thank Royce enough.

name: Jackie Byrom
text: Nice bed but don't work with people.  Nice staff there

resp.text: We're sorry to hear you weren't satisfied with your experience, Jackie. Your feedback is important to us and will be shared with our leadership teams for review.

name: Tricia P
text: Extremely comfortable beds and GREAT customer service from Serah.

resp.text: We're so happy to have you as a fan of our beds and our Madison store!

name: Jeffrey Hilton
text: Love the sleep number beds.

name: Cekeita hopper
text: Great store  Very professional employees

name: Levon Green
text: Staff is Knowledgeable and friendly.

name: Meli Harrison
text: Very convincing salesmen, but they might not be selling you the product you think you're getting. I bought a Dreamline brand mattress (it was NOT cheap), and I was told that it would last 25 years. It has only been about 4 years, and the mattress is already hurting my back and hips (they assured me this would NEVER happen). It may just be this was not a good brand, but they sold it to me as a good brand at a quality price, and I will never buy from these people again.

name: Mona Webb
text: I drove in from Virginia this afternoon and walked in, was immediately assisted but with no high pressure sales tactics. Within 10 minutes I had decided on a mattress (memory foam) and a set of pillows to match. My purchases were immediately loaded and delivered! Great experience!

resp.text: Thanks Mona! We appreciate your business. Let us know if you need anything, and have a great nights sleep! Jeff and Mike.

name: JM_India M
text: The salesperson was very knowlegable about the different types of mattresses. The mattresses were very good but beyond my budget at this time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate our customers :)  !

name: James Jandran
text: Have good deals and staff are very helpful

name: Hannah Crawford
text: Great Mom and Papa store! Nice, friendly people and give great deals! Come check out their beds! They have beautiful beds at a great deal.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate you shopping local small owned businesses like ours!!

name: Dylan Davis
text: Best customer service I’ve ever received while shopping for a bed. Not once was I pressured or felt uncomfortable about making my purchase. All of the mattresses are fairly priced, honestly felt as if I were stealing them compared to shopping at other big name mattress stores. Thanks again Krys and Josh! I’ll be sending everyone I know!

name: Sannie. DaBoss
text: Awesome people, I recommend to everyone. True definition of above and beyond. Very positive customer interaction. If there’s a wheel there is a way (literally). Josh and Chrissy are wonderful people communication and service is great. If you want a mattress these are you people. They are friendly and very human being like and again customer service is immaculant.

name: Steve Clark
text:
If you want the absolute best mattress, you must really lay on beds to determine which bed you body likes.  When I went to BoxDrop Mobile, Krystinee was very helpful and understanding of my needs.

My wife and I just had our first child and our bed was really needing to be replaced. My wife loves a harder bed and I like a less firm bed.  We laid on the mattresses and found the perfect fit for both of us.  Best sleep we’ve had in years. 30 nights so far and very satisfied.

Customer service: 6 out of 5 stars  they made us feel like family.

Price: Great products for great prices we couldn’t find a better price for a bed.

Mattress:  sleep2win copper cooling mattress with adjustable base.  It even makes me stop snoring.....wife approved.

I highly recommend going to visit this store.  A very welcoming mom and pop feel!

**Live local.....shop local!**

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us Steve!!! It’s so good hearing how you and your wife slept like babies!!! Congratulations again on the new addition!!! Here’s to hoping you two get a ton of sleep on that new bed!!! 😴

name: sinister_sinner
text: Very nice, helpful staff. Quality products. However, they did tell me I'd get it with in a week. They just didn't mention it'd be a week three weeks later than they originally told me.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback! We apologize for the unforeseen delay in your estimated date of arrival. With the national foam shortage and the lack of returning workers to the factories as well as Covid shipping delays, we do our best to give our best estimate for delivery from our manufacturer. Unfortunately, freight logistics are beyond our control and we try our best to give you the most accurate shipment date. We still appreciate you shopping with our small owned family business and hopefully production times can start getting more accurate with the return of workers and supply chain issues will help to get the manufacturers up to speed! 😊

name: Eric Weber
text: An easy no pressure trying and buying experience. Perfect amount of options to try, not too many not too few. Very genuine and friendly couple. We are thoroughly enjoying our new mattress

name: Parker Cleveland
text: Great customer service BEST prices in town! Delivery guy is great also... YOU GUYS ROCK!!

resp.text: Parker! We appreciate you coming in and shopping with us!!! We hope you get some good sleep now that you guys chose us! We consider you family! Let us know if you ever need anything! We are always here for you! 😃

name: Barbra Mccall
text:
Me and my fiancé went in today and they really worked with us
No matter what your credit is
Louis and josh really works with you and give good customer service
We got a queen size today and paid $50 down today

name: Nene Marie
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. I would not recommend this place to anyone waited almost a month for a mattress and they gave me the run around mattress is not comfortable as it is from how it felt in the store waited all this time just for the box spring to tear when laying down!

resp.text:
After looking at the order, Deniscia came in on March 4th, 2021 and chose a twin mattress set that was not in stock. Ms. Pettaway chose to do an in-house lay-a-way payment option and put half of the total purchase amount down. We typically do not process in house lay-a-way orders until its paid in full, but we went ahead and ordered the set to try and help her out. Deniscia called to check the status of her order on Saturday March 13th , I, Krystine told the customer we had not received the order yet, that due to COVID, manufacturing has slowed down, which prolonged our delivery on inventory. This is actually an issue we've been patiently having to deal with, as a vendor during the pandemic. It typically takes about 2 weeks from when you pay it off in full, and we would get in contact with her once we received the order from the manufacturer. Ms. Pettaway then called back 20 minutes later with a third party on the phone, at which time both parties proceeded to yell at me using profane language. I explained the situation again being as polite as one can be when faced with someone yelling and screaming on the phone.

I, Krystine, spoke with Deniscia again on the 17th, 19th, 22nd, and again on the 26th when the order had been delivered from the manufacturer. I , Krystine offered the Denescia free delivery for the inconvenience of having to wait on the order despite only putting down half. When the customer came in to make the final payment, I said "Hello, How can we help you?" She told me she was here to pay the final payment on the order. I then asked if she wanted a refund because after speaking previously Ms. Pettaway said that she wished to cancel the order and get a refund. Upon making the final payment we arranged for our delivery driver to deliver the products to the customer free of charge.

Deniscia called us Saturday March 26th saying the boxspring was broken. After speaking to Ms. Pettaway, her mother called us yelling, calling us names etc. We asked Deniscia to submit photos to us so we could file a claim with the manufacturer so they could warrant the workmanship of the product. Upon reviewing the photos, Josh noticed the boxspring was upside down and called Deniscia Monday March 29th to let her know the issue was an upside down boxspring and that the manufacturer warranty would not cover damages that the customer caused by putting the foundation upside down. Despite knowing that, Josh offered to come over and fix the boxspring for Ms. Pettaway on his free time to rectify the situation. In response, he was told, there was nothing we could do to make the situation any better and that the customer would leave constant bad reviews.

We kept in constant contact with Deniscia, speaking to her 5 times in the course of 3 weeks. We worked with her by splitting up the payments and even ordering the set despite not having received full payment. We also provided free delivery for the inconvenience of having to wait. A full refund was also offered to Deniscia who refused it, finally we offered to come over and repair the boxspring for Ms. Pettaway on our free time.

Once the customer and third party became combative with the use of profanity on the phone with us, the phone call was terminated. Our policy when a hostile work environment arises, is to remove ourselves from the situation. We have offered Deniscia Pettaway several different solutions in order to solve the problem and move forward successfully.

We have exhausted every option in order to appease Ms. Pettaway in an attempt to rectify the situation. There is nothing further we can do to make Deniscia satisfied despite the countless options given to her.

Furthermore, we stand behind our process and our policies and are confident we did everything in our power to have a successful outcome.

name: Jessica Wasmer
text: A great place to buy a mattress! I've bought two in 4 months and I'm incredibly happy with both. Ones a King and ones a full. The owner Josh has a very fun and friendly personality that makes the whole experience better. It's a family run business and I will continue to buy from them.

resp.text: Awe! We thank you for your kind words Jessica and so happy to hear you're a repeat customer with us!!! We love that you chose us twice for your bedding needs!! We hope you have many Sunday mornings sleeping in late! 😴 😀

name: Jonathan Hoppins
text: Great People and quality products is what you will find at the box drop. My visit on today was a great experience and the mattress I purchased was ordered with no problems. I recommend the box drop!

resp.text: Thank you again Mr. Hoppins! We are so glad you are happy with your experience! We are here for all of your future sleep needs! Congratulations on your new house! 😃

name: Kertrina Horn
text: Great family friendly environment! Josh and his wife are amazing and very patient also. I didn’t leave until I got want I wanted. They had no problem guiding me to a mattress and box spring that was cost efficient for my budget!

resp.text: Thanks so much Kertrina, we appreciate that you chose us to help with your sleep needs!! We wish you luck in school and your bright future!!!

name: Calvin Johnson
text: If you are looking for a good mattress at a real good price please go check out drop box on government blvd these are some of the nice folks you will ever meet they make you feel love I have bought mattress from them twice and believe me you get the best sleep ever

resp.text: Mr Calvin, we appreciate you shopping with us not only once, but twice! It was an absolute pleasure working with you. Thank you for choosing us for your sleep needs! 😀

name: Dank Tanks
text: Just moved to mobile for school and needed a bed fast and honestly one pretty cheap. Boxdrop made it ridiculously easy and I walked out the door with my bed the same day.

name: J Berry
text: This place is amazing. They have great quality mattresses at affordable prices. The customer service here was impeccable. I would highly recommend this place.

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your feedback J! We appreciate you shopping small local owned businesses like ours.

name: Richard Caudell
text: I lost all my furniture in hurricane Sally and had to find a good bed ASAP. I also have a bad back and working with a tight budget. The owners of this store are the most helpful of the half dozen or so that I tried first. Save your time and go here first. I ended up with an amazing bed and deal. I paid less than half of what I did on the mattress I had before and got a new much higher end mattress. Josh was a huge help and a great person to get to know. Thank you Josh and Krystin for an amazing shopping experience and the perfect price.

resp.text: Richard! It was such a pleasure working with you! We hope you are getting great rest during this ever changing crazy year!!! So glad you decided to shop local with us!!! We wish you luck in this upcoming year and many restful nights! 🙂

name: DollFace Lexi
text: The best customer service ever. Made me feel at home and also helped me with great financial options. I definitely recommend this place. They were very helpful with keeping me within my budget. I will be back for more!

resp.text: Lexi, it was so awesome helping you find a bed in your budget! You work so hard and are so ambitious we appreciate you choosing us for your bedding needs!!! We hope you get plenty of sleep in your future and relax in between all those jobs!!! 😴😴

name: Tracy Deng
text: The process for buying a mattress is easy at boxydrop mattress, Josh and his wife are very helpful. Call and set up an appointment, meet in the store, pick the model, pay and they have a delivery person, deliver with a flat fee. There are decent selections at their store, from firm to Medium traditional mattress, springbox Or memory form toppers, etc. They also offer payment plan that cost less than a family take out meal per week. Give them a try today.

resp.text: Thanks so much Mrs. Tracy! We appreciate you choosing us for your sleep needs! We wish you many mornings of sleeping in! 😊

name: Ben Cardon
text: By far my experience with Box Drop of Mobile has been the best. The owner helped me be able to get a king sized bed. It is the most comfortable bed I have ever sleep in. I’m going to recommend anyone looking for a bed to Box Drop of Mobile and tell them to see Josh!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Ben!! We appreciate you sharing your experience with us and shopping local at our family business. So happy we could find something affordable and comfortable for you! We wish you many mornings of sleeping in. 😊

name: kayla ballard
text: I do not recommend horrible everything

resp.text:
Hi Kayla,
We don’t seem to have your name in our records. Is there any chance you are writing this review on behalf of someone else? Either way, can you let us know which location you visited and a little bit more about your experience. You mentioned “horrible everything”, if you like you can call me (Krystine) at 251-455-0864.

name: Nina Rawz
text: They are very friendly and informative about their products. These mattresses are full quality! Awesome and new. I’m so happy to be able to sleep sound thanks to BoxDrop Mattress.

resp.text: Nina, it was a pleasure working with you this week!! We are so happy that you decided to come in and find a mattress that worked best for you!! Your son was precious. We appreciate you shopping local with us. 😀

name: Jevaughn Shaw
text: Krystine & Josh are great at what they do. They made the process very fun and welcoming. They didn’t try to upsell, matter of fact they undersold and tried their best to fit my budget. If you need a good nights rest they are the people to see. They have a plethora of options that will fit any budget and style of bedding you need!!!

resp.text: Jevaughn, we appreciate you shopping local with us and sharing your experience with us. We loved helping you find something comfortable in your budget!!! We wish you many lazy Sundays in bed! 🙂

name: Tullah Mustafa
text: The best mattress store in town low prices, smiling faces and the sales lady was quite charming.  Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you so much Tullah, we appreciate you sharing your experience with us and so happy to hear Krystine helped you out 😁 we definitely appreciate you!!

name: Silly Head
text: Absolutely amazing service and assistance.  Highly recommend!!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much! It was great meeting with you yesterday! We appreciate you shopping local with us. Happy sleeping! 🙂

name: Matthew Cardon
text: Employees are top notch. Service is fast and friendly. Would recommend to anyone in need. Will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us and others! We appreciate you choosing to shop local with us and we appreciate the recommendations!! 😊

name: Chase Buddendorf
text: I was on the hunt for a bed 6/20/20 checked out a couple places. I have to say I am very pleased with the prices at boxdrop, I bought a queen size bed under $200!! I am very happy with how the process went. Joshua was extremely helpful with any questions I had. Would definitely recommend going here if you are looking for a mattress and you are on a budget!

resp.text: Thank you so much for shopping with us Chase!!! We appreciate your feedback

name: Alex Martinez
text: Girlfriend and I care to box drop hoping to find something to provide a good nights rest and Josh did not disappoint! Great prices and ran by great people, will definitely send more your way!

resp.text: Awesome Alex! We are so happy to hear that! Thanks for choosing to shop local with us and we are so happy you guys found something comfortable! We wish you luck in your new venture as you become parents! 😊

name: Jeanette Brown
text: Didn't have much in there and my order was ready when it came time to get it.

name: jollie b
text: I went to the BOX DROP in Gulfport, Ms on 3/10/2020 and I was really blown away by the managers. Joshua was really informative and very personable. He took his time to explain about the mattresses as well as answered all of the questions that I asked. I was treated so nicely me and my mother definitely purchased a pair of high end quality set of mattresses. If you are in need of good quality and great customer service please stop by the box drop.

resp.text: It was an absolute pleasure meeting with you and Ms Mary the other day Jollie!! You are both welcome back anytime!! We are so happy you decided to shop with us!! :D happy sleeping!

name: Kaffie Krause
text: I bought an awesome mattress for an awesome deal today i LOVE IT . Ask for Josh he's so helpful and its a really nice place and kind people .

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us Kaffie!! So happy Josh was able to take care of you and found something you loved!! Thanks so much for supporting our small family owned business!!

name: Hannah Scott
text: The service is great! And I enjoy the new mattress!

resp.text: Hannah, we appreciate you shopping with us and love that you’re enjoying your new bed! Thanks again for shopping local small family owned businesses like us! 😊

name: Cheryl Turk
text: such a great place for a new mattress , the Lady was extremely helpful and got e exactly what I needed in my price range

name: Blaine Mcbee
text: Great mattresses and very affordable. Easy people to work with 👍🏻 100% recommend

resp.text: Thanks so much for coming in Blaine! It was great meeting you and being able to find something that worked for your comfort needs!! We hope you are sleeping great on your new bed! 😴

name: McKenzie Mc
text: I had a wonderful experience. They had really good prices and quality mattresses.

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in McKenzie! Congratulations on yalls new apartment!! We wish you many Sunday's sleeping in on your new bed 😊🛌

name: Jasmine Battles
text: I really love my bed it’s so comfortable you guys should really shop and they have some great customer service ❤️

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience 😊 with us!!! We are so excited that you love your bed!!! Cheers to many days sleeping in at your new place!!! 😴

name: Sherry Trahan
text: We had an amazing experience with Josh and this store . Extremely reasonable in price and quality . Couldn't expect any better business .

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us! We appreciate you supporting local small family owned businesses like ours! Cheers to happy sleeping Sherry! 😴

name: Robert Pedzinski
text: We were new to the state and went in our first time about a month ago and weren't able to make a purchase but they were very friendly and sweet. Our 2 girls enjoyed the experience as well. We liked them from the start. Went back today and walked out with a bed in less than 15min. Again they were very polite, helpful, informative. Had enjoyable conversations with them will go back for our next purchase.

resp.text: Thanks so much Robert! We love our repeat  customers and your girls are precious!!! Thanks for picking us twice for your sleep needs! We appreciate you guys considering us twice!!! Happy sleeping!! :D

name: Zenoiya Cottrell
text: They are very friendly and their prices are very affordable and honestly and truly they have became family and I forgot to mention that they also have a payment plan that’s for if you don’t have all the money they will let you put 50 down and as much as you want to put down after that . P.s I love my bed💜

resp.text: Zenoiya, it was such a pleasure meeting you and your family. We absolutely love your mom and consider you guys part of our family!! We hope you two new parents get some rest on your new bed and you can drop off that gorgeous baby Winter anytime!!! She is absolutely stunning!!! Keep pushing forward with your singing and don't forget us small people when you make it on The Voice!!!!!!! 😁🥰

name: Nishia Golston
text: The best and reasonable prices in town. Smooth process.

resp.text: Thanks so much for coming in today!! Your family is beautiful! We look forward to hearing how you guys overslept on your new mattress!! Congratulations on your new hybrid king!! Thank you for shopping local with us! 😴

name: Kenslea Davis
text: Really nice family! Helped us find the perfect bed at a great price!

resp.text: Thanks again for coming in today Kenslea! We appreciate you guys choosing us for your new bed needs! So happy you guys found something comfortable and that worked for your budget!congratulations om your new bundle of joy! We look forward to seeing pictures and we wish you guys luck 💕 🎊🛏👶

name: Alex
text: Josh was very professional, informative, & friendly. I’m so excited for my new mattress.. Highly recommend they're service to anyone looking for great service & quality for a great price! Thanks again!

resp.text: Thanks so much Alexciyah! We are so happy Josh helped you get a great bed!! Thanks for coming in and shopping local with us. We appreciate you. Happy sleeping!

name: Ceciley Rooks
text: BoxDrop is great. They were honest and up front about everything. Great selection to choose from, with many financing options available. I would highly recommend anyone with a brain to shop here. We even got the mattress delivered the same day we bought it! Talk about convenience. Will be back!

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience Ceciley! We appreciate you shopping local! So happy tou guys came in yesterday! :D Happy sleeping!

text: Josh and Kris were absolutely fantastic to work with this morning! They were both very personable and definitely don’t try to pressure you into making a purchase. My experience here was wonderful! Came in, looking for a cheap mattress on the spot & Josh came through!! Found one that i liked and couldn’t have gotten a better deal on it. And on top of all of that, he’s super cool and down to earth! Would definitely go back and would HIGHLY recommend!!
Thanks, Josh!

resp.text: Thanks so much Cyrenus for sharing your experience! We are so glad we could help you find something affordable and glad you came in, we appreciate you shopping local. :)

name: Chris Prada
text: Very humble and nice people . Good business would recommend to anyone else

resp.text: Thanks so much again Chris for shopping local with us! We hope you and your wife are sleeping like babies on your new king mattress set! 😊

name: Chris Seabrooks
text: ABSOLUTELY love this business! I would highly, highly recommend this business! They were so nice, definitely did not push us to buy anything. We talked for hours. Highly recommend this establishment to anyone and everyone! Please come!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Chris! We are so glad you guys came in today! We definitely enjoyed y'alls company! Welcome to the coast! :D

name: Chadda Meagher
text: Great service, military friendly, no nonsense. Thank you for your straightforward help and thanks for the great mattresses. Thanks for supporting your military personnel.

resp.text: Thanks so much Chadda! We love supporting our military customers, we appreciate your service in keeping our great country safe!!! Thanks again! 🙂🇺🇲

name: Lox x
text: Needed beds and they had lots of nice beds. The service was great 🦸‍♀️🦸‍♂️ Family owned and operated, kinda felt like coming home. 😊😌

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us!!! We love that you feel comfortable shopping with us. 🙂

name: jamie Rouse
text: You have to make an appointment , so I made the appointment for 2 the person wasn’t there then they finally answered the phone an said they would text or call me when they got there an hour later I called them back an they said they were leaving. I drove over an hour and a half to get there . I would never do business with these people

resp.text:
Thanks for your feedback Jamie,
You are correct in that an appointment is required in order to shop with us. When you communicated to us that you were earlier than your scheduled appointment time, we told you we would arrive shortly. Only after you told us you would like to go shop other places, we safely assumed you did not want to shop with us. We travel from over an hour away also, so we understand your commute time. However, we arrived at our site and you were not there to meet with us.  We have appointments set up until 7pm this evening and were with other customers who had set up a time. We also, chose not to do business with you once you used profane language towards one of our team members. We appreciate your feedback and hope you find what you are looking for. 🙂

name: Rose Seabrooks
text: I’ll recommend anyone I know to get their mattress here. By far the best customer service experience I’ve had. Josh & Christina were personable and enjoyable to talk to. We’ll be back if we ever need another mattress!

resp.text: So glad to hear Rose, it was a pleasure meeting you both today! So glad we could make the experience something extraordinary! :)

name: Shevy Campbell
text:
WOW!!! I’m was so amazed and shocked by the professionalism, hospitality, and just all around EXCELLENT customer service received from Josh and Christine!! They were such down to earth and sweet people, and oh SO helpful! I JUST moved into my very first apartment, and have been sleeping on an air mattress for a week; So you can imagine the relief I got sleeping on my brand new mattress😭😭😭 😍😍

Thank you guys so much! I’ll be sending everyone for a new mattress!
-Shevy

resp.text:
Shevy,
It was an absolute pleasure meeting you and we are so happy you came in, everything happens for a reason and we firmly believe that!! Congratulations on your new apartment and even more... on this next chapter of your life!!! ;) We wish you luck and nothing but happiness from here out!!! Happy sleeping from our family to yours! :D

name: Rhiana Mills
text:
Me & my fiancé went to buy a bed. Found this place & the service couldn’t be better.
The guy who was helping us was very nice & funny. I recommend this place to anyone in or out of the area. Great place to find what you’re looking for!

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your feedback  Rhiana! We appreciate you and your fiance shopping our local small owned family business and we are even happier to know that you guys had a great experience with us! Cheers to sleeping great! :)

name: brittany simmons
text: Boxdrop is AMAZZINGGGG! Not only was it the easiest process of getting a bed, ever; but Josh, was one of the best salesmen ever. I love when someone is knowledgeable in what they do so that they can give me information on whatever I need! 10/10 recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Brittany! It was a pleasure working with you and glad Josh could help make your mattress shopping experience easier!

text: First time buyer for a mattress and couldn’t ask for a better experience. People are very friendly and answered all our questions. Gave us plenty of time to discuss without feeling pressured. They were extremely helpful in all aspects and I will definitely be recommending BoxDrop to anyone who asks where to get a mattress from.

text: Josh was so helpful.  He helped me pick out the perfect mattress for me and was very patient with all my questions.  When I advised I had to find a way to get it home, he offered to help me out.  He also offered to take my old bed to goodwill for me since I had no way to get it there.  I would highly recommend this place and would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Annamae, thanks so much for sharing your experience with us, we are so happy to hear that Josh went above and beyond to help you!

name: Julius Nichols
text: You should definitely buy here.  Quality at the best price. I searched for a better deal and it doesn't exist .

Thanks so much Julius, we appreciate you coming in yesterday and being patient while Josh helped you and your wife find a bed within your price range. (I was unable to meet you due to our new baby being born) We are so happy that you were able to get a brand new mattress that you were happy with. Even though we arent perfect, we try to work with everybody's budget personally to find the best bed in their price range. I'm glad you chose to shop our local small family owned business. We appreciate you sharing your feedback and I look forward to meeting you on your next purchase with us  :D

BUT... my wife and I ended up with a $1700 pillow top for less than half the cost. If you’re looking for your new mattress, this is the place to go. Don’t sleep on these deals! (Pun intended) I will never go anywhere else.  Thanks again BoxDrop!

name: Nicole LeBoeuf
text: Not only were they some of the nicest people I’ve ever met, they were very well educated on each mattress that they supply. Very upfront and honest and will find what fits to your needs. The prices are fractions of what original cost are and payment options are very helpful. Even if you don’t buy anything they are still very nice and will educate you on what type of mattress you’d be looking for in the future. They’re not gimmicky or pressure salesmen. They are a small family helping others, and making a living. Something I’ll gladly support. I’m super excited to get my new bed.

resp.text: Nicole, it was a pleasure meeting and working with you! We are so happy to hear your experience with us was a great one! Thanks again for shopping local with us!

text: I am trying to get in contact with this business does anyone have a working phone number or email so I can contact them to schedule? Phone on file isn’t working. No answer

resp.text: Yes, our phone number is 251-455-0864, as listed. Please give us a call- leave a message please if we are on the other line and we will return your call; or you can message us on Google messenger, our schduling app is also available on our Google business page to set up a time to come in; you can even send us a text or leave your number for us to contact you. 🙂

name: Tanya Davenport
text: Josh was great! He was very nice and knowledgeable. He made choosing a mattress set from them so easy. Thank you so much!!!

name: Lindzey Neely
text: Very nice people! Great prices and extremely hospitable! I would definitely recommend them!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your feedback! We appreciate you shopping local with us!

name: Jessica NUNEZ
text: Josh was amazing and very helpful beds are a great price.. actually made bed shopping fun and entertaining!

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us Jessica!

name: Linda Gravois aka tattfae
text:
Yes they are friendly but forget it if they sell you the wrong mattress!!! We told them we needed a mattress that was 5x6 ft. for a camper. We brought it home and less than an hour later we were calling them back telling them that they sold us the wrong mattress!!! Didn't know we had to do their job for them as far as knowing the measurements!!!! Well they are telling us we can't get our money back or exchange it or anything because of ms. state law because of contamination issues. We had it less than an hour and never unwrapped it!! and now we are stuck with a mattress we can't use!!!😠😠😠 Will never shop there again!!!!!!!! Way to keep a customer happy!!!

My husband told your husband that he needed a mattress FOR A CAMPER and he also told him 5 x 6 ft.  If you're husband knew anything about measurements and the mattress business he should have known that your mattresses wouldn't work! We didn't know there was a difference but then we are not in the MATTRESS BUSINESS! As for the contamination issue those mattresses are hauled over the road and god knows where else before they even get to your store!! We never even unwrapped it so there is no way we contaminated any more than it already probably was. Also you nor your husband made us aware that once we bought it we were stuck with it! I nor my husband remember seeing any signage stating that policy all we saw on the walls was sport memorabilia! As for what I signed on your husband's phone that was nothing but a white screen with a line through it for the signature. Oh and by the way if you're that worried about contamination maybe you ought to keep your kids from jumping and crawling on the mattresses!!!!

resp.text: Hey Mrs. Linda, You guys came In today looking for a queen mattress, we sold you a queen mattress. You specifically told Josh you needed a mattress that was 60x80 (which is a standard queen mattress).  Josh asked you multiple times if you were sure it would fit your space, you were very adamant about getting a queen mattress today and reassured him a queen size mattress is what you needed. We did not have any measurements other than those that you gave us, as a we did not measure your space, you did. Our return policy complies with Mississippi state laws, in that we cannot accept returns because of a contamination policy they have in place. Also, we explained this to you on the phone and you asked us to do something unethical and take back your mattress, that had been inside your home. Once you became combative with the use of profanity on the phone with us, the phone call was terminated, because our policy is when a hostile work environment arises we remove ourselves from the situation. We are sorry the measurements you took weren’t accurate and the space doesn’t fit a standard queen size mattress. Thanks for your feedback.

name: Tuesday Gooden
text: AFFORDABLE!! Looking for a great mattress set at a reasonable price I recommend you to go here!! Jason was by far the best!! He did everything he could to make sure we was satisfied!!! I assure you we was not disappointed!!

resp.text: Thanks so much again Tuesday! We are so happy we could give you a better sleep buying experience!!

name: merryellen philipson
text: I had literally been looking everywhere for a mattress and I think facebook knew it .. I saw their ad pop up during memorial weekend .. I got all the information I needed by simply messaging them .. They were super awesome people really down to earth and easy to talk to .. Josh showed me the differences in mattresses.. It was hit in the warehouse but he was patient with me ... his wife was sweet and very helpful as well .. They made me feel like a part of the family and I got the mattress that I wanted so it was win win !

resp.text: Awe thank you so much for your kind words Merryellen!! We appreciate you shopping with us, so glad we could make this experience exceptional for you. :)

resp.text: Thank you so much Chris! We appreciate your business!! ☺️

name: Christopher Bridges
text: Nice staffs and affordable prices on comfortable beds

resp.text: Thanks so much Chris! We are so happy you decided to shop local with us. Happy sleeping.

name: Bee Bo
text: Good mattresses for a good price if you’re on a budget, along with a very friendly staff

name: Shannon Becker
text: Very nice....very informative....great deals!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Shannon! It was a pleasure meeting you today. We really enjoyed your company while helping you get the best mattress!! We appreciate you shopping local with us!!!

name: Bonnie Trotter
text: Great, down to earth people with great quality mattresses!

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your feedback Bonnie!

name: charles w
text: Boxdrop great company great service!

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience Charles!! We are so glad to hear that!

name: Joe Chudson
text: No public bathroom.

resp.text:
Hey Joe!
We appreciate your review.  But are curious as to how and why you gave us a one star review when our Mobile location is not currently open for business yet?  Your comment that we have no public bathrooms available is actually untrue. Not only do we a bathroom available to customers, but we have TWO available to use when we do open that you are welcome to come in and test out!! 😁 We offer two different types of toilet paper, hand soap, warm water and fresh paper towels to use when you do come visit us! We look forward to your review of our bathroom when we do open!!! Thanks so much Joe.

-Krys

name: Andrew Yfantis
text: Highly recommended very friendly

resp.text: Thank You Andrew!! It was a pleasure helping you!

name: Bobby Boswell
text: Great people !!!!! Highly recommend

resp.text: Thanks so much Bobby!! :)

name: Aaron Fertig
text: Very friendly and good products

name: Nicholas Mancuso
text: Great people, service, and quality!!

resp.text:
Hey Nicolas,
It was awesome working with you! We thank you so much for sharing your experience with us and taking the time to shop local!

name: Tytianna Burage
text: Awesome

resp.text: Thanks so much Tytianna, you're awesome also! Thanks for choosing us and shopping local!!! :D

name: Andrew Ayers
text: Box drop Gulfport can't be beat for how they treat customers, or the price. Why go anywhere else?

name: Joshua Greer
text: Love this Place!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your feedback!

text: Really good prices

resp.text: Thanks so much for your feedback Frank! It was a pleasure working with you!! Look forward to working with you again! :D

name: Mike Miller
text: They have my recommendation

resp.text: Thanks so much Mike for your feedback! We appreciate your business. From our family to yours!
